eng:
A subscription to the Kfar Shmaryahu Sports Club is the best investment you can make for yourself and your mental and physical health. The subscription keeps you within a structured framework of sports activities through regular activities, classes, and instructors who know and accompany you. Club members enjoy a wide range of activities for all ages in a calm atmosphere with personal attention and guidance. Subscribers have full access to all club facilities at no extra charge:

An indoor, heated semi-Olympic pool operating all year round.
A toddler pool active during the summer days.
A fully equipped gym with direct instruction and supervision by a professional coaching staff.
A diverse studio with classes for all ages.
Sports courts: tennis, mini-golf, and our own Crazy Ball area 
A dry sauna.
